landing.title: CAMPIONATO DEL CALCIO DEL MONDO CRYPTO 2018
landing.section1Title: CHI È IL TUO CRYPTO DAD?
landing.section1Text: I fan delle squadre più classificate al mondo competono per il Crypto-World Soccer Championship.
landing.section2Text: I campioni Crypto dell'anno vinceranno trofei Augmented Reality. I fan potranno posizionare il trofeo AR sulle superfici attraverso un'app (ARKit Style).
landing.section2Text2: Seven Trophies will be produced yearly, for each Top Club of World, Europe, Asia, South America, North/Central America, Oceania and Africa
landing.section3Text: You will receive back 1 BOLEIRO (BLR) token for each goal scored, that can be used in upcoming features and social soccer based projects
landing.section3Text2: BOLEIRO(BLR) is an ERC-20 token built with high security standards. 'Boleiro' is a brazilian soccer slang for 'Very Skilled Player'.
landing.section4Text: Do you really know soccer ? Earn Ether by predicting the right results of soccer competitions
landing.section5Title: MOST RANKED SOCCER CLUBS OF THE WORLD
Selection of the best teams from over 100 countries, competing for the top of the World
landing.infoText: This DApp uses MetaMask. Click the logo to install it if necessary
landing.infoText3: BLOCK-CHAMPS comes from the idea of joining our passion of Soccer, Crypto and AR
